CINAVIA information:

This worked for me:

1. Extract audio from Cinavia movie. I used Magix movie edit pro. Broke the link between sound and video.ï»¿ Exported the sound as .wav.

2. Then i opened the file in Adobe Audition 3.0. Opened Effect-->Time and pitch-->Pitch shifter to adjust the "pitch" to -1 and "cents" to 0.

3. Saved the file as .wav

4. Opened the program "Avidemux 2.5" and opened the Cinavia protected .avi movie. Go toï»¿ Audio-->Main track-->Audio source. Then chose your edited .wav file.

5. Save as xx.avi
